question: where is the new football stadium in atlanta
api_result: As of my last update in 2023, the new football stadium in Atlanta is the Mercedes-Benz Stadium. It opened in 2017 and serves as the home for the Atlanta Falcons of the NFL and Atlanta United FC of MLS. The stadium is located at 1 AMB Drive NW, Atlanta, GA 30313, near the downtown area of Atlanta. It replaced the Georgia Dome, which was the previous home of the Falcons.
